You are a GUI agent. You are given a task and your action history, with screenshots. You need to perform the next action to complete the task.

## Output Format
```
Thought: ...
Action: ...
```

## Action Space

click(start_box='<|box_start|>(x1,y1)<|box_end|>')
left_double(start_box='<|box_start|>(x1,y1)<|box_end|>')
right_single(start_box='<|box_start|>(x1,y1)<|box_end|>')
drag(start_box='<|box_start|>(x1,y1)<|box_end|>', end_box='<|box_start|>(x3,y3)<|box_end|>')
hotkey(key='')
type(content='') #If you want to submit your input, use "\n" at the end of `content`.
scroll(start_box='<|box_start|>(x1,y1)<|box_end|>', direction='down or up or right or left')
wait() #Sleep for 5s and take a screenshot to check for any changes.
finished(content='xxx') # Use escape characters \', \", and \n in content part to ensure we can parse the content in normal python string format.

## Note
- Use English in `Thought` part.
- Write a small plan and finally summarize your next action (with its target element) in one sentence in `Thought` part.
- My computer's password is 'password', feel free to use it when you need sudo rights.

## User Instruction
Help me modify the folder used to store my recordings to Desktop

Thought: I noticed that there’s a "Tools" option in the top menu bar of the VLC player interface. To change the location where recording files are saved, I first need to access this settings entry point. So now, I’m going to click on this "Tools" button to open up more options.
Action: click(start_box='<|box_start|>(950,376)<|box_end|>')

Thought: The Tools menu has been expanded, and I've spotted the Preferences option at the bottom. This is exactly what I was looking for—through this entry point, I can access the settings interface where I should be able to find options related to file storage locations. Let me click on it and see what happens.
Action: click(start_box='<|box_start|>(1023,612)<|box_end|>')

Thought: It seems that I've entered the wrong section; this interface only displays basic settings like interface appearance and playback behavior. To change the recording path, I should look under the "Input / Codecs" tab, as it typically contains more advanced configuration options related to media handling. Let me switch over to that tab and see if there are any relevant storage path settings available.
Action: click(start_box='<|box_start|>(985,267)<|box_end|>')

Thought: Ah, I found it! In the Files section, there's an option labeled "Record directory or filename." This is exactly where I can set the recording path. Now, all I need to do is click on this input box and choose a new location for saving my recordings.
Action: click(start_box='<|box_start|>(1023,706)<|box_end|>')

Thought: Great! I've located the input box for setting the recording directory. Now, all I need to do is type "/home/user/Desktop" into this field, and VLC will save all future recordings directly to my desktop. Let me go ahead and enter this path.
Action: type(content='/home/user/Desktop')

Thought: The path has been set up correctly, and now we just have one final step left - saving this setting. I noticed a blue "Save" button in the lower right corner of the interface; clicking it will ensure that VLC saves all future recordings directly to my desktop.
Action: click(start_box='<|box_start|>(1217,908)<|box_end|>')

Thought: That's great! I just successfully changed the default save location for VLC recordings to my desktop through the preferences settings. After clicking the Save button, all future recorded videos will automatically be saved directly to my desktop folder. This setup should make it much easier to find and manage my recording files.
Action: finished(content='已将我的录制文件夹修改为桌面。')
